short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Would You Rather - Pro is a fun game to play when you need a quick refresh from work or your meetings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Would You Yather - Pro is a fun game to play in your free time, it brings classic Would you rather questions right in your browser, play it whenever you are bored of your meetings or work
